<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 561 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Price** 140 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** held in 2 hands

**Bulk** L
</row>

<row gap="medium">
<row gap="tiny"><row>**Activate**</row><actions string="Single Action" /><row>Interact</row></row>

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

This oil fills a weapon with cosmic power of an alignment. Each _aligned oil_ is crafted to one alignment: chaos, evil, good, or law (such as a _good-aligned oil_). A weapon anointed with this oil gains the effects of the property rune matching its alignment: [_anarchic_](/Equipment.aspx?ID=291) (chaos), [_axiomatic_](/Equipment.aspx?ID=292) (law), [_holy_](/Equipment.aspx?ID=300) (good), or [_unholy_](/Equipment.aspx?ID=308) (evil). This lasts for 1 minute.
